thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-British Automotive Holding Signs Credit Agreement With mBank

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-British Automotive Holding Signs Credit Agreement With mBank
text:
Feb 7(Reuters) - BRITISH AUTOMOTIVE HOLDING SA:
* SAID ON TUESDAY IT SIGNED TWO AGREEMENTS WITH MBANK FOR UP TO 140 MLN ZLOTY CREDIT LINE
* FROM MID-MAY 2018 CREDIT LINE WILL BE EXTENDED TO 170 MLN ZLOTYS WHEN COMPANY FULFILS AGREED CONDITIONS REGARDING ITS FINANCIAL STANDING
* CREDIT TO BE USED TO FINANCE ONGOING OPERATIONS * PREVIOUS CREDIT AGREEMENT FOR UP TO 100 MLN ZLOTYS HAS BEEN TERMINATED Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
